FUCKING

oh believe me, it was genius

as a person with depression i can honestly say that you are given zero ability to control the character and how he reacts to situations simply because he has a condition

i mean there was one point where the fucker got drunk on white wine and then thanked his girlfriend for putting up with his fucking disgusting self

and this at the same time tried to be believable but hardly touches the topic of suicide... like maybe once

and he would have killed himself long before the game """"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""ends"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""" if this were real
